about_the_game:
Experience the greatest soundtrack in all of self-similar space. Focus on your administrator tasks while listening to an atmospheric soundscape composed by critically acclaimed artist Guillaume David (Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus).

All tracks are now available in FLAC lossless quality (and for those with less storage than EDDEN, there are MP3 files available).
detailed_description:
Experience the greatest soundtrack in all of self-similar space. Focus on your administrator tasks while listening to an atmospheric soundscape composed by critically acclaimed artist Guillaume David (Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus).

All tracks are now available in FLAC lossless quality (and for those with less storage than EDDEN, there are MP3 files available).
